text.__SUMMARY__: Shorea macrobalanos (called, along with some other species in the genus Shorea, Yellow Meranti) is a species of plant in the family Dipterocarpaceae. It is a tree endemic to Borneo.
text.References: Ashton, P. (1998). "Shorea macrobalanos". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T31921A9668585. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T31921A9668585.en. Retrieved 22 December 2017.
